intro: Stenostomum jamaicense, commonly known as Jamaican starfruit, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes cucumbers and melons. The plant is characterized by its trailing habit and heart-shaped leaves. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant. The fruit is a small, yellow, star-shaped berry that ripens in the summer months.
